list.expr: group(cnch_config_build_info{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster"}) by (version_scm) unless (group(cnch_config_build_info{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster"}) by (version_scm) offset 1m)
list.name: cnch-version

panels.description: CPU usage per pod, compared to it's limit and request. Pod are guaranteed to be provided the requested CPU but Throttled if they reach the limit.
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description:
Memory usage per pod, compared to it's limit and request. Pod are guaranteed to be provided the requested memory but OOMKilled if they reach the limit.
Working Set Size (WSS) is an estimate of how much memory cannot be evicted, representing the memory required to keep working (hot active cache is counted).
It's calculated by "total usage - inactive file". It includes recently accessed memory, dirty memory, and kernel memory.
panels.title: Memory Usage (WSS)

panels.description:
RSS is basically the non-cache memory usage.
Note:
Only anonymous and swap cache memory is listed as part of 'rss' stat.
This should not be confused with the true 'resident set size' or the
amount of physical memory used by the cgroup.
see https://www.kernel.org/doc/Documentation/cgroup-v1/memory.txt
panels.title: Memory Usage (RSS)

panels.description: CPU Throttling

targets.expr:
sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="", container!="dynamic-config"}[5m])) by (pod, container)
/ sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="", container!="dynamic-config"}[5m])) by (pod, container)

panels.title: CPU Throttling

targets.expr:
sort_desc(sum(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod))

sort_desc(sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod))

panels.description: Pod Read IOPS

targets.expr: ceil(sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{container!="", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])))

panels.title: Read IOPS

panels.description: Pod Write IOPS

targets.expr: ceil(sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_writes_total{container!="", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])))

panels.title: Write IOPS

panels.description: Pod Read IOPS ThroughPut

targets.expr: sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{container!="", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m]))

panels.title: Read IOPS ThroughPut

panels.description: Pod Read IOPS ThroughPut

targets.expr: sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{container!="", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m]))

panels.title: Write IOPS ThroughPut

targets.expr:
sort_desc(sum(rate(container_network_receive_packets_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod))

sort_desc(sum(rate(container_network_transmit_packets_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod))

sort_desc(sum(rate(container_network_receive_packets_dropped_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod))

sort_desc(sum(rate(container_network_transmit_packets_dropped_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod))
sum by (persistentvolumeclaim, pod, volume) (kube:pvc:workload{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"})
sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (kube:pvc:workload:capacity{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}/1024/1024/1024)

sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) ((kube:pvc:workload:capacity{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}
- kube:pvc:workload:available{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"})/1024/1024/1024)
sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (kube:pvc:workload:available{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}/1024/1024/1024)

sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_status_phase{namespace=~"$namespace",phase=~"(Pending|Lost)"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim) 
+ sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_status_phase{namespace=~"$namespace",phase=~"(Lost)"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim) 
* on (persistentvolumeclaim)
group_left kube:pvc:workload{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}

sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (kube:pvc:workload:inodes_used{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"} 
/ kube:pvc:workload:inodes{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"} * 100)

panels.description: Amount of data transferred to and from disk. ioDisk to /.* display only the PVC disk attached to selected pod, .* display all host disk (including not mounted)
panels.title: Disk I/O Bandwidth

panels.description: Completed disk I/O operations. Keep in mind the number of operations requested might be higher, since the system is able to merge adjacent to each other (see merged operations chart). ioDisk to /.* display only the PVC disk attached to selected pod, .* display all host disk (including not mounted)
panels.title: Disk I/O operations per Sec

panels.description: Disk Utilization measures the amount of time the disk was busy with something. This is not related to its performance. 100% means that the system always had an outstanding operation on the disk. Keep in mind that depending on the underlying technology (logical disk fronting many disk), 100% here may or may not be an indication of congestion.
panels.title: Disk Utilization Time

panels.description: The number of merged disk operations. The system is able to merge adjacent I/O operations, for example two 4KB reads can become one 8KB read before given to disk. ioDisk to /.* display only the PVC disk attached to selected pod, .* display all host disk (including not mounted)
panels.title: Disk Merged Operations per Sec

targets.expr: group(cnch_config_build_info{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster"}) by (version_scm)

panels.description: Number of Pods in Running state
panels.title: Pods Running

panels.description: Number of Pods not Available
panels.title: Pods Unavailable

panels.description: Number of Queries on Virtual WareHouse over last 24h.

targets.expr: sum(increase(cnch_profile_events_labelled_query_total{resource_type="vw", namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", pod=~"$pod"}[1d]))

panels.title: VW Queries last 24h

panels.description: Pct distribution for query latency. P95 mean 95% of queries took less than this value

targets.expr: cnch:latency:queries_cluster:pct95{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster"}
cnch:latency:queries_cluster:pct99{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster"}

panels.title: Queries Duration

panels.description: Each point represent the percentage of queries that took more than 10s

targets.expr: cnch:latency:queries_cluster:slow_ratio{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster"}

panels.title: Slow Queries >10s

panels.description: Rate of Queries observed on servers. Unlimited are queries that don't use a Virtual WareHouse like Select on system tables.

targets.expr: sum(cnch:profile_events:labelled_query_vw:total_rate5m{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", workload=~"$workload"})
sum(cnch:profile_events:labelled_query_unlimited:total_rate5m{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", workload=~"$workload"})

panels.title: Queries Per Sec

panels.description: Rate of Default Queries run on Virtual Warehouses.

targets.expr: sum without (vw, wg) (cnch:profile_events:labelled_query_vw:total_rate5m{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", workload=~"$workload", pod=~"$pod", query_type="default"})

panels.title: Default VW QPS

panels.description: Rate of Insert Queries run on Virtual Warehouses.

targets.expr: sum without (vw, wg) (cnch:profile_events:labelled_query_vw:total_rate5m{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", workload=~"$workload", pod=~"$pod", query_type="insert"})

panels.title: Insert VW QPS

panels.description: Rate of Unlimited Queries (Default / Insert / System) run on system tables.

targets.expr: sum without (pod) (cnch:profile_events:labelled_query_unlimited:total_rate5m{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", workload=~"$workload"})

panels.title: Unlimited QPS

panels.description: Current Default Queries.

targets.expr: sum(cnch_current_metrics_query{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", pod=~"$pod", query_type="default"}) by (namespace, pod)

panels.title: Current Default Queries

panels.description: Current Insert Queries.

targets.expr: sum(cnch_current_metrics_query{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", pod=~"$pod", query_type="insert"}) by (namespace, pod)

panels.title: Current Insert Queries

targets.expr: cnch_cluster_bytekv_running_txn{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster"}[5m]

panels.description: Number of background Merge / Mutate tasks
panels.title: Current Merge/Mutate tasks

panels.description: Success rate calculated with 1 - ( failure rate / total queries rate) excluding QueriesFailedFromUser queries

targets.expr:
1 - (sum by (pod) (cnch:profile_events:labelled_query_vw:error_rate5m{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", pod=~"$pod"})
/
sum by (pod) (cnch:profile_events:labelled_query_vw:total_rate5m{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", pod=~"$pod"}))

panels.title: VW Queries Success

panels.description: Success rate calculated with 1 - ( failure rate / total queries rate) excluding QueriesFailedFromUser queries

targets.expr:
1 - (sum by (pod) (cnch:profile_events:labelled_query_unlimited:error_rate5m{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", pod=~"$pod"})
/
sum by (pod) (cnch:profile_events:labelled_query_unlimited:total_rate5m{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", pod=~"$pod"}))

panels.title: Unlimited Queries Success

panels.description: Success rate calculated with 1 - rate (commitV2 + commitV1) / rate of total commit

targets.expr:
1 - (sum(
  rate(cnch_profile_events_cnch_txn_commit_v2_failed_total{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", pod=~"$pod"}[5m]),
  rate(cnch_profile_events_cnch_txn_commit_v2_failed_total{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])
) by (namespace, pod)
/ sum(rate(cnch_profile_events_cnch_txn_committed_total{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (namespace, pod)
* on (namespace,pod) group_left
namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", pod=~"$pod"})

panels.title: Transaction Commit Success Rate

panels.description: Success rate calculated with 1 - ( failure rate / total req rate)

targets.expr:
1 - (sum(rate(cnch_profile_events_sd_request_upstream_failed_total{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (namespace, pod)
/ sum(rate(cnch_profile_events_sd_request_upstream_total{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (namespace, pod)          
* on (namespace,pod) group_left
namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", pod=~"$pod"})

panels.title: SD Requests Success Rate

panels.description: Success rate calculated with 1 - ( failure rate / rate of total read | write ).

targets.expr:
1 - (sum(rate(cnch_profile_events_write_buffer_from_hdfs_write_failed_total{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (namespace, pod)
/ sum(rate(cnch_profile_events_write_buffer_from_hdfs_write_total{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (namespace, pod)          
* on (namespace,pod) group_left
namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", pod=~"$pod"})

1 - (sum(rate(cnch_profile_events_read_buffer_from_hdfs_read_failed_total{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (namespace, pod)
/ sum(rate(cnch_profile_events_read_buffer_from_hdfs_read_total{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (namespace, pod)          
* on (namespace,pod) group_left
namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload", pod=~"$pod"})

panels.title: HDFS R/W Success Rates

panels.description: Query that timeout per seconds

targets.expr: cnch:latency:queries_timeout:rate5m{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", workload=~"$workload", pod=~"$pod"}

panels.title: Queries Timeout per Sec

panels.description: Bytes read per seconds from HDFS Buffers
panels.title: Read from Buffer per Sec

panels.description: Bytes write per seconds to HDFS Buffers
panels.title: Write to Buffer per Sec
